hints.content:
The bar for pirate books lines up with $\blueD{300}$ on the scale. 
 

[[☃ image 1]]

The library has $\blueD{300}$ pirate books.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Type of Book and the vertical axis labeled Number of Books. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Dinosaur, Insect, Pirate, and Superhero. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300, and 360. The bar line for each type of book shows the following: Dinosaurs bar line extends to 120, Insect bar line extends to 240, Pirate bar line extends to 300, and Superhero bar line extends to 240. A blue line is drawn to the right from 300, which reaches to the end of the Pirate bar line. !

hints.content:
The bar for insect books lines up with $\purpleD{240}$ on the scale.  



[[☃ image 1]]


The library has $\purpleD{240}$ insect books.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Type of Book and the vertical axis labeled Number of Books. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Dinosaur, Insect, Pirate, and Superhero. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300, and 360. The bar line for each type of book shows the following: Dinosaurs bar line extends to 120, Insect bar line extends to 240, Pirate bar line extends to 300, and Superhero bar line extends to 240. A purple line is drawn to the right from 240, which reaches to the end of the Insect bar line. !

hints.content: The library has $\greenD{60}$ more pirate books than insect books.

question.content:
Alice wondered how many books in the school library are about her favorite subjects. She searched the library's online catalog and graphed the results.


[[☃ image 1]]


**How many more pirate books does the library have than insect books?**

[[☃ input-number 1]] more pirate books

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Type of Book and the vertical axis labeled Number of Books. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Dinosaur, Insect, Pirate, and Superhero. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300, and 360. The bar line for each type of book shows the following: Dinosaurs bar line extends to 120, Insect bar line extends to 240, Pirate bar line extends to 300, and Superhero bar line extends to 240. !
